1370: Mourin was born in Marcktgang in 1370.
Got married to Lielde at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Lielde, Marcibilia, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Lielde, Kerolus, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Lielde, Hardenbernus, at age 22.
Lost son Kerolus when Kerolus was 2 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Lielde, Berta, at age 25.
1379: Had a daughter with Lielde, Hille, at age 29.
Lost daughter Hille when Hille was 1 years old.
1384: Lost his wife Lielde while she was giving birth to Euffemia in 1384.
